name: Realms of Dr. Chaos
summary: This is very loosely based on the NES game Dr. Chaos, mainly in its plot about the main character rescuing his brother Dr. Chaos from his own ill-advised forays into inter-dimensional travel. It consists of three maps centered around puzzles and exploration. The player is required to enter various extra-dimensional realms and puzzle out the central goal of each in order to reach a key, switch, or other objective.
